attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In view of recent actions by the Football League to deduct 15 points from Leeds United Football Club for the season 07/08,there are some quaters of society desperate to bring further turmoil and deductions to the club.Would the Prime Minister please over see the situation bearing in mind the way the club has represented the United Kingdom overseas in its glorious past encounters in European cup campaigns.We have a proud footballing history behind us and after the bad management we have endured are now turning the corner and would like to continue to be Marching On Together.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
